description: Documentation for 9.7.16.6. Memory Consistency Model for 5th generation of TensorCore operations

directories.name: 971662_pipelined_tcgen05_instructions
directories.description: The asynchronous `tcgen05` operations may execute and complete in a different order than they were issued. However, some specific pairs of the asynchronous `tcgen05` instructions form `tcgen05` pipelines, where in the two asynchronous operations are guaranteed to execute in the same order as the ...

files.title: Overview
files.summary: Ordering of `tcgen05` instructions is described in terms of two key concepts:

files.title: 9.7.16.6.1. Asynchronous Operations
files.summary: The tcgen05 family of instructions are divided into 2 categories:

files.title: 9.7.16.6.3. Specialized Inter-thread Synchronization for tcgen05 instructions
files.summary: The `tcgen05` instructions support a specialized inter-thread synchronization which are optimized for `tcgen05` family of instructions. The standard memory consistency model synchronization mechanisms also apply to the `tcgen05` family of instructions.

files.title: 9.7.16.6.5. Shared Memory Accesses
files.summary: The shared memory accesses by `tcgen05.mma` and `tcgen05.cp` operations are performed in the asynchronous proxy (async proxy).
